sentences.sContent: The young man has a bee in his head about space travel.
sentences.sContent_eng: The young man has a bee in his head about space travel.
sentences.sCn: 那个年轻人对太空旅行着了迷。

sentences.sContent: Their research in rocketry blazed the way for space travel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their research in rocketry blazed the way for space travel.
sentences.sCn: 他们在火箭方面的研究开辟了太空旅行的道路。

sentences.sContent: It might be kind of fanciful to some, but on the other hand, space travel was considered science fiction not that many decades ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: It might be kind of fanciful to some, but on the other hand, space travel was considered science fiction not that many decades ago.
sentences.sCn: 对于某些人，它可能只是种幻想，但换句话说，几十年前，太空旅行不也是被认为是科幻小说吗。
